pages.text: Ars Nouveau 1.18, Configs!$(li)Adds extensive configs for every glyph, including values for damage, duration, and more!$(li)Relays and splitters can now reach 30 blocks.$(li)Fixes infinite capacity flasks$(li)Fixes AOE for Spell Turrets$(li)Fixes inconsistent sconce direction$(li)Fixes the spell search bar$(li)Adds redstone support for Ritual Braziers

$(li)Ritual tablets now drop if you do not start the ritual but break the brazier.$(li)Fixes particles spawning while the game is paused.$(li)Ritual of restoration now properly damages undead.$(li)Crystallizer output item can now be changed.$(li)Adds a config to limit the number of specific glyph combinations$(li)Any spell can now be made a Starter Spell.$(li)New hints and tooltips during spell crafting!
